description:

What you will learn

1. Create your very first automated test case

2. Use descriptive programming

3. Use data tables

4. Identify all objects

5. Work as an Automation Engineer at your job every
day

6. Write robust and easy to maintain UFT scripts

7. Learn how to work in an Agile environment as an Automation
Tester

8. Learn Automation Testing skills for any tool

9. Debugging scripts

10. So much more

This is the most complete QTP/UFT learning guide you
will find on the web. You will only learn the
skills and techniques that you will actually use on
the job. We would never waste your time with
outdated methodologies. Our content comes straight
from recent and ongoing projects, which means that our
material is completely up to date! You will learn the strategies
utilized by the best IT companies

You will learn everything about UFT/QTP so that you can build
your very first automated test. In between, you will discover the
necessary skills to reach the top of this industry. Before you
know it, you will be the top automation expert at your job! Don't
take our word for it, get started now!

Bonus

1. The real interview script that landed us every
single job as Automation Engineers
2. An ebook, "5 Steps To Creating Perfect
Automation Testing Scripts"
3. Real UFT/QTP functions to improve your skills right now
Developed on the job!
4. Access to the Keyword Driven Framework designed over 10,000
hours of automation testing
5. Access to a constantly evolving Automation Testing blog

And if you are not 100% satisfied, you can receive a full
refund within 30 days of your purchase! You have absolutely
nothing to lose
